sentences.en: But Yahoo may not be able to avoid a buyout by Microsoft.
sentences.cn: 但雅虎可能避免不了微软的收购.

sentences.en: But Yahoo may not be able to avoid buyout by Microsoft.
sentences.cn: 但是,雅虎可能无法避免微软的收购.

sentences.en: Buyout exits will lift both the M & A and IPO markets.
sentences.cn: 收购再退出的操作,将同时提振 并购 和IPO市场.

sentences.en: Feinberg, the reclusive founder of Cerberus Capital Management, the big buyout firm.
sentences.cn: 他是大型投资公司博龙资产管理公司的创始人.

sentences.en: Fu - hu has said that current antenna video content is essential to take the buyout approach.
sentences.cn: 曾伏虎说,天线视频目前的节目内容基本采取的是买断方式.

sentences.en: He received three ways through advertising: direct share, buyout and the Under - plus share.
sentences.cn: 他通过三种方式拿到广告位: 直接分成 、 买断以及保底加分成.

sentences.en: It is thought that a management buyout is one option.
sentences.cn: 管理层收购被认为是一种选择。

sentences.en: KKR looks particularly vulnerable because it is less diversified than its arch - rival in the leveraged - buyout business.
sentences.cn: KKR看似尤为脆弱,因为与其杠杆收购业务中的主要竞争对手相比,其多样化程度较差.

sentences.en: Of course, welcome the buyout, after all, money first!
sentences.cn: 当然欢迎买断了, 毕竟先收钱嘛!

sentences.en: So in Orwellian fashion , the buyout firms decided to change their moniker.
sentences.cn: 因此,用奥威尔的说法, 并购公司决定改名换姓.

sentences.en: Some years back our competitors were known as'leveraged - buyout operators.
sentences.cn: 几年前,我们的竞争对手被称为 “ 杠杆并购机构”.

sentences.en: The buyout negotiation lasted several days.
sentences.cn: 收购的谈判持续了几天.

sentences.en: The LBO ( leveraged buyout ) also are at the edge of danger.
sentences.cn: 而杠杆收购 ( leveragedbuyout ) 也正处于危险边缘.

sentences.en: They staged a management buyout to pre - empt a takeover bid.
sentences.cn: 他们筹划买下资方的全部产权以便抢先得到兼并出价的好处.

sentences.en: When the credit markets collapsed in 2007, the leveraged buyout boom abruptly ended, leaving damage.
sentences.cn: 2007年信贷市场崩溃之时, 杠杆收购潮迅即结束, 留下哀鸿遍野.

trans.tran_cn: 全部买下，买下（公司或产业）
